edu.ncsu.csc316.airline_mileage.data

Class Flight

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc316.airline_mileage.data.Flight
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Flight>

    public class Flight
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Flight>
    Creates a flight object with an airline code, airline description, flight number, origin, destination and miles flown
    Author:
    Caitlyn Wiley
